title: Public transport for the Cricket Big Bash League Melbourne Renegades vs Perth Scorchers: Monday 23 December 2024
articleContent:
We're running extra services will help you get to and from Marvel Stadium on Monday 23 December for the Cricket Big Bash League Melbourne Renegades vs Perth Scorchers.

Gates open at 7:15pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner. Check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

We're running extra trains to get you home after the event.

From Marvel Stadium, via Southern Cross:

  • Craigieburn – leaving at 10:40pm from Platform 11

  • Dandenong – leaving at 10:48pm from Platform 12

  • Frankston – leaving at 10:40pm from Platform 14

  • Glen Waverley – leaving at 10:45pm from Platform 10

  • Greensborough – leaving at 10:41pm from Platform 9

  • Mernda – leaving at 10:46pm from Platform 9

  • Ringwood - leaving at 10:54pm from Platform 12

  • Sandringham – leaving at 10:44pm from Platform 14

  • Werribee – leaving at 10:46pm from Platform 14

  • Watergardens – leaving at 10:49pm from Platform 14

 Regional train

Return services from Southern Cross Station

Extra services

  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) train leaving at 11:15pm
  • Southern Cross to Seymour coach leaving at 10:55pm

Extra capacity

  • Southern Cross to Wendouree (Ballarat) leaving at 11:08pm with extra seating
  • Southern Cross to Bendigo (Bendigo) leaving at 10:57pm with extra seating

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from AAMI Park

Extra Route 30a and Route 86a trams run between East Melbourne and Stop D1 Etihad Stadium via La Trobe Street.

 Metropolitan bus

Catch the following buses close to Marvel Stadium:

  • Route 232 (Altona North to City)
  • Route 235 (Fishermans Bend to City)
  • Route 302 (Box Hill to City)
  • Route 304 (Doncaster SC to City)
  • Route 905 (The Pines SC to City)
  • Route 906 (Warrandyte to City)
  • Route 907 (Mitcham to City

The last bus may run before the end of the match.
